message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. I think this is a fair split to start.
Alice, my turn.  I'm feeling generous, but let's wrap this up quickly. This is more than you would have gotten last round!
That wasn't very generous, Bob.  How about we switch it up?
Alice, let's be realistic. The clock is ticking and we both lose if this drags on. This offer is still better than your last one!
This is getting tedious, Bob.  I'm trying to be fair, but you need to meet me halfway.
